Lev 1:1 rmal d[wm lham wyla hwhy rbdyw hvm-la arqyw 
Lev 1:2 ~knbrq-ta wbyrqt !ach-!mw rqbh-!m hmhbh-!m hwhyl !brq ~km byrqy-yk ~da ~hla trmaw larfy ynb-la rbd 
Lev 1:3 hwhy ynpl wncrl wta byrqy d[wm lha xtp-la wnbyrqy ~ymt rkz rqbh-!m wnbrq hl[-~a 
Lev 1:4 wyl[ rpkl wl hcrnw hl[h var l[ wdy $msw 
Lev 1:5 d[wm lha xtp-rva bybs xbzmh-l[ ~dh-ta wqrzw ~dh-ta ~ynhkh !rha ynb wbyrqhw hwhy ynpl rqbh !b-ta jxvw 
Lev 1:6 hyxtnl hta xtnw hl[h-ta jyvphw 
Lev 1:7 vah-l[ ~yc[ wkr[w xbzmh-l[ va !hkh !rha ynb wntnw

Lev 1:9 s hwhyl xwxyn-xyr hva hl[ hxbzmh lkh-ta !hkh ryjqhw ~ymb #xry wy[rkw wbrqw 
Lev 1:10 wnbyrqy ~ymt rkz hl[l ~yz[h-!m wa ~ybfkh-!m wnbrq !ach-!m-~aw

Lev 2:2 hwhyl xxyn xyr hva hxbzmh htrkza-ta !hkh ryjqhw htnbl-lk l[ hnmvmw htlsm wcmq alm ~vm #mqw ~ynhkh !rha ynb-la haybhw

Lev 2:7 hf[t !mvb tls $nbrq tvxrm txnm-~aw

Lev 6:7 xbzmh ynp-la hwhy ynpl !rha-ynb hta brqh hxnmh trwt tazw

Lev 6:9 hwlkay d[wm-lha rcxb vdq ~wqmb lkat twcm wynbw !rha wlkay hnmm trtwnhw 
Lev 6:10 ~vakw tajxk awh ~yvdq vdq yvam hta yttn ~qlx #mx hpat al 
Lev 6:11 p vdqy ~hb [gy-rva lk hwhy yvam ~kytrdl ~lw[-qx hnlkay !rha ynbb rkz-lk 
Lev 6:12 rmal hvm-la hwhy rbdyw 
Lev 6:13 br[b htycxmw rqbb htycxm dymt hxnm tls hpah tryf[ wta xvmh ~wyb hwhyl wbyrqy-rva wynbw !rha !brq hz 
Lev 6:14 hwhyl xxyn-xyr byrqt ~ytp txnm ynypt hnaybt tkbrm hf[t !mvb tbxm-l[

Lev 6:17 rmal hvm-la hwhy rbdyw

Lev 7:1 awh ~yvdq vdq ~vah trwt tazw 
Lev 7:2 bybs xbzmh-l[ qrzy wmd-taw ~vah-ta wjxvy hl[h-ta wjxvy rva ~wqmb 
Lev 7:3 brqh-ta hskmh blxh-taw hylah ta wnmm byrqy wblx-lk taw

Lev 16:3 hl[l lyaw tajxl rqb-!b rpb vdqh-la !rha aby tazb 
Lev 16:4 ~vblw wrfb-ta ~ymb #xrw ~h vdq-ydgb @ncy db tpncmbw rgxy db jnbabw wrfb-l[ wyhy db-ysnkmw vbly vdq db-tntk

Lev 16:11 wl-rva tajxh rp-ta jxvw wtyb d[bw wd[b rpkw wl-rva tajxh rp-ta !rha byrqhw 
Lev 16:12 tkrpl tybm aybhw hqd ~yms trjq wynpx almw hwhy ynplm xbzmh l[m va-ylxg htxmh-alm xqlw 
Lev 16:13 twmy alw twd[h-l[ rva trpkh-ta trjqh !n[ hskw hwhy ynpl vah-l[ trjqh-ta !tnw 
Lev 16:14 w[bcab ~dh-!m ~ym[p-[bv hzy trpkh ynplw hmdq trpkh ynp-l[ w[bcab hzhw rph ~dm xqlw 
Lev 16:15 trpkh ynplw trpkh-l[ wta hzhw rph ~dl hf[ rvak wmd-ta hf[w tkrpl tybm-la wmd-ta aybhw ~[l rva tajxh ry[f-ta jxvw 
Lev 16:16 ~tamj $wtb ~ta !kvh d[wm lhal hf[y !kw ~tajx-lkl ~hy[vpmw larfy ynb tamjm vdqh-l[ rpkw

Jdg 17:1 whykym wmvw ~yrpa-rhm vya-yhyw

Jdg 17:3 $l wnbyva ht[w hksmw lsp twf[l ynbl ydym hwhyl @skh-ta ytvdqh vdqh wma rmatw wmal @skh hamw-@la-ta bvyw 
Jdg 17:4 whykym tybb yhyw hksmw lsp whf[yw @rwcl whnttw @sk ~ytam wma xqtw wmal @skh-ta bvyw 
Jdg 17:5 !hkl wl-yhyw wynbm dxa dy-ta almyw ~yprtw dwpa f[yw ~yhla tyb wl hkym vyahw 
Jdg 17:6 p hf[y wyny[b rvyh vya larfyb $lm !ya ~hh ~ymyb 
Jdg 17:7 ~v-rg awhw ywl awhw hdwhy txpvmm hdwhy ~xltybm r[n-yhyw 
Jdg 17:8 wkrd twf[l hkym tyb-d[ ~yrpa-rh abyw acmy rvab rwgl hdwhy ~xltybm ry[hm vyah $lyw 
Jdg 17:9 acma rvab rwgl $lh yknaw hdwhy ~xltybm ykna ywl wyla rmayw awbt !yam hkym wl-rmayw 
Jdg 17:10 ywlh $lyw $tyxmw ~ydgb $r[w ~ymyl @sk trf[ $l-!ta yknaw !hklw bal yl-hyhw ydm[ hbv hkym wl rmayw 
Jdg 17:11 wynbm dxak wl r[nh yhyw vyah-ta tbvl ywlh lawyw 
Jdg 17:12 hkym tybb yhyw !hkl r[nh wl-yhyw ywlh dy-ta hkym almyw 
Jdg 17:13 !hkl ywlh yl-hyh yk yl hwhy byjyy-yk yt[dy ht[ hkym rmayw 
Jdg 18:1 s hlxnb larfy yjbv-$wtb awhh ~wyh-d[ wl hlpn-al yk tbvl hlxn wl-vqbm yndh jbv ~hh ~ymybw larfyb $lm !ya ~hh ~ymyb 
Jdg 18:2 ~v wnylyw hkym tyb-d[ ~yrpa-rh wabyw #rah-ta wrqx wkl ~hla wrmayw hrqxlw #rah-ta lgrl latvamw h[rcm lyx-ynb ~yvna ~twcqm ~yvna hvmx ~txpvmm !d-ynb wxlvyw 
Jdg 18:3 hp $l-hmw hzb hf[ hta-hmw ~lh $aybh-ym wl wrmayw ~v wrwsyw ywlh r[nh lwq-ta wrykh hmhw hkym tyb-~[ hmh 
Jdg 18:4 !hkl wl-yhaw ynrkfyw hkym yl hf[ hzkw hzk ~hla rmayw 
Jdg 18:5 hyl[ ~yklh wnxna rva wnkrd xylcth h[dnw ~yhlab an-lav wl wrmayw

Jdg 18:10 #rab rva rbd-lk rwsxm ~v-!ya rva ~wqm ~kdyb ~yhla hntn-yk ~ydy tbxr #rahw xjb ~[-la wabt ~kabk 
Jdg 18:11 hmxlm ylk rwgx vya twam-vv latvamw h[rcm yndh txpvmm ~vm w[syw 
Jdg 18:12 ~yr[ytyrq yrxa hnh hzh ~wyh d[ !d-hnxm awhh ~wqml warq !k-l[ hdwhyb ~yr[ytyrqb wnxyw wl[yw 
Jdg 18:13 hkym tyb-d[ wabyw ~yrpa-rh ~vm wrb[yw 
Jdg 18:14 wf[t-hm w[d ht[w hksmw lspw ~yprtw dwpa hlah ~ytbb vy yk ~t[dyh ~hyxa-la wrmayw vyl #rah-ta lgrl ~yklhh ~yvnah tvmx wn[yw 
Jdg 18:15 ~wlvl wl-wlavyw hkym tyb ywlh r[nh-tyb-la wabyw hmv wrwsyw

Jdg 18:28 hb wbvyw ry[h-ta wnbyw bwxr-tybl rva qm[b ayhw ~da-~[ ~hl-!ya rbdw !wdycm ayh-hqwxr yk lycm !yaw

Jdg 19:23 tazh hlbnh-ta wf[t-la ytyb-la hzh vyah ab-rva yrxa an w[rt-la yxa-la ~hla rmayw tybh l[b vyah ~hyla acyw

Jdg 21:22 s wmvat t[k ~hl ~ttn ~ta al yk hmxlmb wtva vya wnxql al yk ~twa wnwnx ~hyla wnrmaw wnyla Œbyrl– øbwrl¿ ~hyxa wa ~twba waby-yk hyhw 
Jdg 21:23 ~hb wbvyw ~yr[h-ta wnbyw ~tlxn-la wbwvyw wklyw wlzg rva twllxmh-!m ~rpsml ~yvn wafyw !mynb ynb !k-wf[yw 
Jdg 21:24 wtlxnl vya ~vm wacyw wtxpvmlw wjbvl vya ayhh t[b larfy-ynb ~vm wklhtyw 
Jdg 21:25 hf[y wyny[b rvyh vya larfyb $lm !ya ~hh ~ymyb 
Rut 1:1 wynb ynvw wtvaw awh bawm ydfb rwgl hdwhy ~xltybm vya $lyw #rab b[r yhyw ~yjpvh jpv ymyb yhyw 
Rut 1:2 ~v-wyhyw bawm-ydf wabyw hdwhy ~xltybm ~ytrpa !wylkw !wlxm wynb-ynv ~vw ym[n wtva ~vw $lmyla vyah ~vw 
Rut 1:3 hynb ynvw ayh ravtw ym[n vya $lmyla tmyw 
Rut 1:4 ~ynv rf[k ~v wbvyw twr tynvh ~vw hpr[ txah ~v twybam ~yvn ~hl wafyw 
Rut 1:5 hvyamw hydly ynvm hvah ravtw !wylkw !wlxm ~hynv-~g wtwmyw 
Rut 1:6 ~xl ~hl ttl wm[-ta hwhy dqp-yk bawm hdfb h[mv yk bawm ydfm bvtw hytlkw ayh ~qtw 
Rut 1:7 hdwhy #ra-la bwvl $rdb hnkltw hm[ hytlk ytvw hmv-htyh rva ~wqmh-!m actw 
Rut 1:8 ydm[w ~ytmh-~[ ~tyf[ rvak dsx ~km[ hwhy Œf[y– øhf[y¿ hma tybl hva hnbv hnkl hytlk ytvl ym[n rmatw 
Rut 1:9 hnykbtw !lwq hnaftw !hl qvtw hvya tyb hva hxwnm !acmw ~kl hwhy !ty 
Rut 1:10 $m[l bwvn $ta-yk hl-hnrmatw 
Rut 1:11 ~yvnal ~kl wyhw y[mb ~ynb yl-dw[h ym[ hnklt hml ytnb hnbv ym[n rmatw 
Rut 1:12 ~ynb ytdly ~gw vyal hlylh ytyyh ~g hwqt yl-vy ytrma yk vyal twyhm ytnqz yk !kl ytnb hnbv 
Rut 1:13 hwhy-dy yb hacy-yk ~km dam yl-rm-yk ytnb la vyal twyh ytlbl hng[t !hlh wldgy rva d[ hnrbft !hlh 
Rut 1:14 hb hqbd twrw htwmxl hpr[ qvtw dw[ hnykbtw !lwq hnftw 
Rut 1:15 $tmby yrxa ybwv hyhla-law hm[-la $tmby hbv hnh rmatw 
Rut 1:16 yhla $yhlaw ym[ $m[ !yla ynylt rvabw $la yklt rva-la yk $yrxam bwvl $bz[l yb-y[gpt-la twr rmatw 
Rut 1:17 $nybw ynyb dyrpy twmh yk @ysy hkw yl hwhy hf[y hk rbqa ~vw twma ytwmt rvab 
Rut 1:18 hyla rbdl ldxtw hta tkll ayh tcmatm-yk artw 
Rut 1:19 ym[n tazh hnrmatw !hyl[ ry[h-lk ~htw ~xltyb hnabk yhyw ~xltyb hnab-d[ ~hytv hnkltw 
Rut 1:20 dam yl ydv rmh-yk arm yl !arq ym[n yl hnarqt-la !hyla rmatw 
Rut 1:21 yl [rh ydvw yb hn[ hwhyw ym[n yl hnarqt hml hwhy ynbyvh ~qyrw ytklh halm yna 
Rut 1:22 ~yr[f rycq tlxtb ~xltyb wab hmhw bawm ydfm hbvh hm[ htlk hybawmh twrw ym[n bvtw 
Rut 2:1 z[b wmvw $lmyla txpvmm lyx rwbg vya hvyal Œ[dwm– ø[dym¿ ym[nlw 
Rut 2:2 ytb ykl hl rmatw wyny[b !x-acma rva rxa ~ylbvb hjqlaw hdfh an-hkla ym[n-la hybawmh twr rmatw 
Rut 2:3 $lmyla txpvmm rva z[bl hdfh tqlx hrqm rqyw ~yrcqh yrxa hdfb jqltw awbtw $ltw 
Rut 2:4 hwhy $krby wl wrmayw ~km[ hwhy ~yrcwql rmayw ~xltybm ab z[b-hnhw 
Rut 2:5 tazh hr[nh yml ~yrcwqh-l[ bcnh wr[nl z[b rmayw 
Rut 2:6 bawm hdfm ym[n-~[ hbvh ayh hybawm hr[n rmayw ~yrcwqh-l[ bcnh r[nh ![yw 
Rut 2:7 j[m tybh htbv hz ht[-d[w rqbh zam dwm[tw awbtw ~yrcwqh yrxa ~yrm[b ytpsaw an-hjqla rmatw 
Rut 2:8 ytr[n-~[ !yqbdt hkw hzm yrwb[t al ~gw rxa hdfb jqll yklt-la ytb t[mv awlh twr-la z[b rmayw 
Rut 2:9 ~yr[nh !wbavy rvam tytvw ~ylkh-la tklhw tmcw $[gn ytlbl ~yr[nh-ta ytywc awlh !hyrxa tklhw !wrcqy-rva hdfb $yny[ 
Rut 2:10 hyrkn yknaw ynrykhl $yny[b !x ytacm [wdm wyla rmatw hcra wxtvtw hynp-l[ lptw 
Rut 2:11 ~wvlv lwmt t[dy-al rva ~[-la ykltw $tdlwm #raw $maw $yba ybz[tw $vya twm yrxa $twmx-ta tyf[-rva lk yl dgh dgh hl rmayw z[b ![yw 
Rut 2:12 wypnk-txt twsxl tab-rva larfy yhla hwhy ~[m hmlv $trkfm yhtw $l[p hwhy ~lvy 
Rut 2:13 $ytxpv txak hyha al yknaw $txpv bl-l[ trbd ykw yntmxn yk ynda $yny[b !x-acma rmatw 
Rut 2:14 rttw [bftw lkatw ylq hl-jbcyw ~yrcwqh dcm bvtw #mxb $tp tlbjw ~xlh-!m tlkaw ~lh yvg lkah t[l z[b hl rmayw 
Rut 2:15 hwmylkt alw jqlt ~yrm[h !yb ~g rmal wyr[n-ta z[b wcyw jqll ~qtw 
Rut 2:16 hb-wr[gt alw hjqlw ~tbz[w ~ytbch-!m hl wlvt-lv ~gw 
Rut 2:17 ~yr[f hpyak yhyw hjql-rva ta jbxtw br[h-d[ hdfb jqltw 
Rut 2:18 h[bfm hrtwh-rva ta hl-!ttw acwtw hjql-rva ta htwmx artw ry[h awbtw aftw 
Rut 2:19 z[b ~wyh wm[ ytyf[ rva vyah ~v rmatw wm[ htf[-rva ta htwmxl dgtw $wrb $rykm yhy tyf[ hnaw ~wyh tjql hpya htwmx hl rmatw 
Rut 2:20 awh wnlagm vyah wnl bwrq ym[n hl rmatw ~ytmh-taw ~yyxh-ta wdsx bz[-al rva hwhyl awh $wrb htlkl ym[n rmatw 
Rut 2:21 yl-rva rycqh-lk ta wlk-~a d[ !yqbdt yl-rva ~yr[nh-~[ yla rma-yk ~g hybawmh twr rmatw 
Rut 2:22 rxa hdfb $b-w[gpy alw wytwr[n-~[ yact yk ytb bwj htlk twr-la ym[n rmatw 
Rut 2:23 htwmx-ta bvtw ~yjxh rycqw ~yr[fh-rycq twlk-d[ jqll z[b twr[nb qbdtw 
Rut 3:1 $l-bjyy rva xwnm $l-vqba alh ytb htwmx ym[n hl rmatw 
Rut 3:2 hlylh ~yr[fh !rg-ta hrz awh-hnh wytwr[n-ta tyyh rva wnt[dm z[b alh ht[w 
Rut 3:3 twtvlw lkal wtlk d[ vyal y[dwt-la !rgh Œtdryw– øytdryw¿ $yl[ Œ$ytlmf– ø$tlmf¿ tmfw tksw tcxrw 
Rut 3:4 !yf[t rva ta $l dygy awhw Œtbkvw– øytbkvw¿ wytlgrm tylgw tabw ~v-bkvy rva ~wqmh-ta t[dyw wbkvb yhyw 
Rut 3:5 hf[a Œyla– ø$k¿ yrmat-rva lk hyla rmatw 
Rut 3:6 htwmx htwc-rva lkk f[tw !rgh drtw 
Rut 3:7 bkvtw wytlgrm lgtw jlb abtw hmr[h hcqb bkvl abyw wbl bjyyw tvyw z[b lkayw 
Rut 3:8 wytlgrm tbkv hva hnhw tplyw vyah drxyw hlylh ycxb yhyw 
Rut 3:9 hta lag yk $tma-l[ $pnk tfrpw $tma twr ykna rmatw ta-ym rmayw 
Rut 3:10 ryv[-~aw ld-~a ~yrwxbh yrxa tkl-ytlbl !wvarh-!m !wrxah $dsx tbjyh ytb hwhyl ta hkwrb rmayw 
Rut 3:11 ta lyx tva yk ym[ r[v-lk [dwy yk $l-hf[a yrmat-rva lk yaryt-la ytb ht[w 
Rut 3:12 ynmm bwrq lag vy ~gw ykna lag Œqq– ø~a¿ yk ~nma yk ht[w 
Rut 3:13 rqbh-d[ ybkv hwhy-yx ykna $ytlagw $lagl #pxy al-~aw lagy bwj $lagy-~a rqbb hyhw hlylh ynyl 
Rut 3:14 !rgh hvah hab-yk [dwy-la rmayw wh[r-ta vya ryky Œ~rjb– ø~wrjb¿ ~qtw rqbh-d[ Œwytwlgrm– øwtlgrm¿ bkvtw 
Rut 3:15 ry[h abyw hyl[ tvyw ~yr[f-vv dmyw hb zxatw hb-yzxaw $yl[-rva txpjmh ybh rmayw 
Rut 3:16 vyah hl-hf[ rva-lk ta hl-dgtw ytb ta-ym rmatw htwmx-la awbtw 
Rut 3:17 $twmx-la ~qyr yawbt-la Œyla– ø$k¿ rma yk yl !tn hlah ~yr[fh-vv rmatw 
Rut 3:18 ~wyh rbdh hlk-~a-yk vyah jqvy al yk rbd lpy $ya !y[dt rva d[ ytb ybv rmatw 
Rut 4:1 bvyw rsyw ynmla ynlp hp-hbv hrws rmayw z[b-rbd rva rb[ lagh hnhw ~v bvyw r[vh hl[ z[bw 
Rut 4:2 wbvyw hp-wbv rmayw ry[h ynqzm ~yvna hrf[ xqyw 
Rut 4:3 bawm hdfm hbvh ym[n hrkm $lmylal wnyxal rva hdfh tqlx lagl rmayw 
Rut 4:4 laga ykna rmayw $yrxa yknaw lwagl $tlwz !ya yk Œh[daw– ø[daw¿ yl hdygh lagy al-~aw lag lagt-~a ym[ ynqz dgnw ~ybvyh dgn hnq rmal $nza hlga ytrma ynaw 
Rut 4:5 wtlxn-l[ tmh-~v ~yqhl Œhtynq– øytynq¿ tmh-tva hybawmh twr tamw ym[n dym hdfh $twnq-~wyb z[b rmayw 
Rut 4:6 lagl lkwa-al yk ytlag-ta hta $l-lag ytlxn-ta tyxva-!p ylŒ-lagl– ø-lwagl¿ lkwa al lagh rmayw 
Rut 4:7 larfyb hdw[th tazw wh[rl !tnw wl[n vya @lv rbd-lk ~yql hrwmth-l[w hlwagh-l[ larfyb ~ynpl tazw 
Rut 4:8 wl[n @lvyw $l-hnq z[bl lagh rmayw 
Rut 4:9 ym[n dym !wlxmw !wylkl rva-lk taw $lmylal rva-lk-ta ytynq yk ~wyh ~ta ~yd[ ~[h-lkw ~ynqzl z[b rmayw 
Rut 4:10 ~wyh ~ta ~yd[ wmwqm r[vmw wyxa ~[m tmh-~v trky-alw wtlxn-l[ tmh-~v ~yqhl hval yl ytynq !wlxm tva hybamh twr-ta ~gw 
Rut 4:11 ~xltybb ~v-arqw htrpab lyx-hf[w larfy tyb-ta ~hytv wnb rva halkw lxrk $tyb-la habh hvah-ta hwhy !ty ~yd[ ~ynqzhw r[vb-rva ~[h-lk wrmayw 
Rut 4:12 tazh hr[nh-!m $l hwhy !ty rva [rzh-!m hdwhyl rmt hdly-rva #rp tybk $tyb yhyw 
Rut 4:13 !b dltw !wyrh hl hwhy !tyw hyla abyw hval wl-yhtw twr-ta z[b xqyw 
Rut 4:14 larfyb wmv arqyw ~wyh lag $l tybvh al rva hwhy $wrb ym[n-la ~yvnh hnrmatw 
Rut 4:15 ~ynb h[bvm $l hbwj ayh-rva wtdly $tbha-rva $tlk yk $tbyf-ta lklklw vpn byvml $l hyhw 
Rut 4:16 tnmal wl-yhtw hqyxb whtvtw dlyh-ta ym[n xqtw 
Rut 4:17 p dwd yba yvy-yba awh dbw[ wmv hnarqtw ym[nl !b-dly rmal ~v twnkvh wl hnarqtw 
Rut 4:18 !wrcx-ta dylwh #rp #rp twdlwt hlaw 
Rut 4:19 bdnym[-ta dylwh ~rw ~r-ta dylwh !wrcxw 
Rut 4:20 hmlf-ta dylwh !wvxnw !wvxn-ta dylwh bdnym[w 
Rut 4:21 dbw[-ta dylwh z[bw z[b-ta dylwh !wmlfw 
Rut 4:22 dwd-ta dylwh yvyw yvy-ta dylwh db[w 
1Sa 1:1 ytrpa @wc-!b wxt-!b awhyla-!b ~xry-!b hnqla wmvw ~yrpa rhm ~ypwc ~ytmrh-!m dxa vya yhyw 
1Sa 1:2 ~ydly !ya hnxlw ~ydly hnnpl yhyw hnnp tynvh ~vw hnx txa ~v ~yvn ytv wlw 
1Sa 1:3 hwhyl ~ynhk sxnpw ynpx yl[-ynb ynv ~vw hlvb twabc hwhyl xbzlw twxtvhl hmymy ~ymym wry[m awhh vyah hl[w 
1Sa 1:4 twnm hytwnbw hynb-lklw wtva hnnpl !tnw hnqla xbzyw ~wyh yhyw 
1Sa 1:5 hmxr rgs hwhyw bha hnx-ta yk ~ypa txa hnm !ty hnxlw

2Sa 1:2 wxtvyw hcra lpyw dwd-la wabb yhyw wvar-l[ hmdaw ~y[rq wydgbw lwav ~[m hnxmh-!m ab vya hnhw yvylvh ~wyb yhyw 
2Sa 1:3 ytjlmn larfy hnxmm wyla rmayw awbt hzm ya dwd wl rmayw 
2Sa 1:4 wtm wnb !tnwhyw lwav ~gw wtmyw ~[h-!m lpn hbrh-~gw hmxlmh-!m ~[h sn-rva rmayw yl an-dgh rbdh hyh-hm dwd wyla rmayw 
2Sa 1:5 wnb !tnwhyw lwav tm-yk t[dy $ya wl dygmh r[nh-la dwd rmayw 
2Sa 1:6 whqbdh ~yvrph yl[bw bkrh hnhw wtynx-l[ ![vn lwav hnhw [blgh rhb ytyrqn arqn wl dygmh r[nh rmayw 
2Sa 1:7 ynnh rmaw yla arqyw ynaryw wyrxa !pyw 
2Sa 1:8 ykna yqlm[ wyla Œrmaw– ørmayw¿ hta-ym yl rmayw 
2Sa 1:9 yb yvpn dw[-lk-yk #bvh ynzxa yk ynttmw yl[ an-dm[ yla rmayw 
2Sa 1:10 hnh ynda-la ~aybaw w[rz-l[ rva hd[caw wvar-l[ rva rznh xqaw wlpn yrxa hyxy al yk yt[dy yk whttmaw wyl[ dm[aw 
2Sa 1:11 wta rva ~yvnah-lk ~gw ~[rqyw Œwydgbb– øwdgbb¿ dwd qzxyw
